metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: SQL Hosting
SQL Hosting
If you want your web site to be able to store and retrieve data from a database, your web server should have access to a database-system that uses the SQL language.
content.html: If you want your web site to be able to store and retrieve data from a database, your web server should have access to a database-system that uses the SQL language.

content.text: If your web server is hosted by an Internet Service Provider (ISP), you will have to look for SQL hosting plans.
content.html: If your web server is hosted by an Internet Service Provider (ISP), you will have to look for SQL hosting plans.

content.text: The most common SQL hosting databases are MS SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, and MS Access.
content.html: The most common SQL hosting databases are MS SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, and MS Access.

content.text: MS SQL Server
Microsoft's SQL Server is a popular database software for database-driven web sites with high traffic.
content.html: Microsoft's SQL Server is a popular database software for database-driven web sites with high traffic.

content.text: SQL Server is a very powerful, robust and full featured SQL database system.
content.html: SQL Server is a very powerful, robust and full featured SQL database system.

content.text: Oracle
Oracle is also a popular database software for database-driven web sites with high traffic.
content.html: Oracle is also a popular database software for database-driven web sites with high traffic.

content.text: Oracle is a very powerful, robust and full featured SQL database system.
content.html: Oracle is a very powerful, robust and full featured SQL database system.

content.text: MySQL
MySQL is also a popular database software for web sites.
content.html: MySQL is also a popular database software for web sites.

content.text: MySQL is a very powerful, robust and full featured SQL database system.
content.html: MySQL is a very powerful, robust and full featured SQL database system.

content.text: MySQL is an inexpensive alternative to the expensive Microsoft and Oracle solutions.
content.html: MySQL is an inexpensive alternative to the expensive Microsoft and Oracle solutions.

content.text: MS Access
When a web site requires only a simple database, Microsoft Access can be a solution.
content.html: When a web site requires only a simple database, Microsoft Access can be a solution.

content.text: MS Access is not well suited for very high-traffic, and not as powerful as MySQL, SQL Server, or Oracle.
content.html: MS Access is not well suited for very high-traffic, and not as powerful as MySQL, SQL Server, or Oracle.

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
Which of the following is a popular SQL database software for high-traffic, database-driven websites?
content.html: Which of the following is a popular SQL database software for high-traffic, database-driven websites?
